request.title: Basic feature Schema
request.description: Basic profile feature schema for POST request

description.description: Set a text description of the device

location.description: Set the location of the device

range.description: Set the deviceâ€™s geo fencing range

mobileNumber.description: Set deviceâ€™s geo fencing SMS phone number

controllerGroupList.description: Configure a list of comma-separated controller groups

portOffset.description: Set the TLOC port offset when multiple devices are behind a NAT

controlSessionPps.description: Set the policer rate for control sessions

trackInterfaceTag.description: OMP Tag attached to routes based on interface tracking

maxOmpSessions.description: Set the maximum number of OMP sessions <1..100> the device can have

trackDefaultGateway.description: Enable or disable default gateway tracking

adminTechOnFailure.description: Collect admin-tech before reboot due to daemon failure

onDemandIdleTimeout.description: Set the idle timeout for on-demand tunnels

epfr.description: Enable SLA Dampening and Enhanced App Routing.

documentation.description: This is the documentation for POST request schema for Basic profile feature
